greeting.text:
Welcome to the AVIATRIX Signal bot 

Our bot is based on a neural network from OpenAI 
It can predict aircraft crash rates with 85% confidence 

To start using the bot, click “Register”

registration.text:
▶️After successful registration, you will receive a notification from the bot about successful registration

After which you can use the signals\!▶️

instructions.text: Hello! This is information about the bot 💀 *ALEXEY BOT* 💀
